STATE v. COBB. No. COA04-508. Court of Appeal of North Carolina Filed August 2, 2005. Certification Date August 22, 2005. Appeal from the Guilford (02CRS23421, 02CRS23422, 02CRS23423, 02CRS23424, 02CRS23425, 02CRS23426)

Case reported without published opinion No error in part; remanded for resentencing.
